alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 9:49AM CDT until June 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 17.1 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
